channel.title: Windows 7 Question
channel.description:
Ok so I just baught Gmod if you don't know what that is look it up lawl its awesome.
Anyway the "w" "d" "s" "a" are the directional buttons. and the mouse is to look from side to side and up and down. well when i try to move up with "w" and try to look around with the mouse i can't. so i thought it was the game, but when i did it outside the game it did the same thing. Has anyone else had this problem. If so can you tell me how to fix.

item.title: Windows 7 Question
item.dc:creator: @R_A_R_E_S R A R E S
item.description:
@R_A_R_E_S wrote:

[quote=“CoonHunter, post:2, topic:366975”][quote author=R A R E S link=topic=463171.msg3387930#msg3387930 date=1288646398]
Ok so I just baught Gmod if you don’t know what that is look it up lawl its awesome.

Anyway the “w” “d” “s” “a” are the directional buttons. and the mouse is to look from side to side and up and down. well when i try to move up with “w” and try to look around with the mouse i can’t. so i thought it was the game, but when i did it outside the game it did the same thing. Has anyone else had this problem. If so can you tell me how to fix.
[/quote]
I have Garry’s Mod on both my laptop and desktop, both run windows 7, and I can’t say I have this problem.[/quote]
I don’t know i fixed it. I just can’t use the mouse pad. So i got a regular opticle mouse and it works fine now.

Read full topic
